decibel_reduction.docs:
**int, templatable**: The reduction of the media stream in decibels. Must be between 0 and 50.

*See also: [Mixer Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/mixer.html#mixer-speaker-apply-ducking-action)*

duration.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time), templatable**: The length of time to transition between the current reduction level and the new reduction level. Defaults to `0s`.

*See also: [Mixer Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/mixer.html#mixer-speaker-apply-ducking-action)*

apply_ducking.docs:
This action ducks (reduces the volume of) the media stream.

*See also: [`mixer_speaker.apply_ducking` Action](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/mixer.html#mixer-speaker-apply-ducking-action)*
